title: Former Congolese warlord sentenced to 30 years in prison for complicity in crimes against humanity
subhead: Roger Lumbala was found guilty by the Paris criminal court on Monday for acts committed in 2002 and 2003 while he led a rebel group in eastern DR Congo. It is the first time a foreign national court has tried a former Congolese warlord for crimes committed in that region.

title: Rob Reiner's son arrested after director and his wife found dead
subhead: Nick Reiner was taken into police custody on Monday, the day after the bodies of his parents were discovered in their Los Angeles home.

title: Trump's FBI purge: 'We are not trending toward an authoritarian force. We are at one'
subhead: Since returning to power, Donald Trump has relentlessly sought to reshape the federal law enforcement agency. In his eyes, it is guilty of investigating him and people close to him. He has set out to bring it to heel by firing dozens of agents.

title: France moves to phase out support system for Ukrainian refugees
subhead: With budget constraints tightening, aid and accommodation for displaced Ukrainians in France are gradually winding down. Many complex situations remain unresolved, leaving families without a path to independence.
